description.english: Complete Chapter 1.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 1.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 1.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 1.

description.english: Complete Chapter 2.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 2.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 2.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 2.

description.english: Complete Chapter 3.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 3.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 3.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 3.

description.english: Complete Chapter 4.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 4.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 4.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 4.

displayName.english: I'm Not on a Holy War
displayName.italian: Non sono in una guerra santa

description.english: Defeat Akasha and complete the campaign.
description.german: Akasha besiegen und die Kampagne abschließen.
description.french: Bats Akasha et achève la campagne.
description.italian: Sconfitto Akasha e completata la campagna.
description.spanish: Derrota a Akasha y completa la campaña.

description.english: Complete Chapter 2 in Insane.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 2 sous Dément.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 2 in demenziale.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 2 en Demente.

description.english: Complete Chapter 3 in Insane.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 3 sous Dément.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 3 in demenziale.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 3 en Demente.

description.english: Complete Chapter 4 in Insane.
description.french: Achève le chapitre 4 sous Dément.
description.italian: Completa Capitolo 4 in demenziale.
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 4 en Demente.

description.english: Defeat Akasha and complete the campaign in Insane.
description.french: Bats Akasha et achève la campagne sous Dément.
description.italian: Sconfitto Akasha e completata la campagna in demenziale.
description.spanish: Derrota a Akasha y completa la campaña en Demente.

description.english: Complete 1 mission in co-op.
description.french: Achève 1 mission en coopérative.
description.italian: Completa 1 missione in cooperazione.
description.spanish: Completa 1 misión en cooperativa.

description.english: Complete 10 missions in co-op.
description.french: Achève 10 missions en coopérative.
description.italian: Completa 10 missioni in cooperazione.
description.spanish: Completa 10 misiones en cooperativa.

displayName.english: Thanks To All the Little People

description.english: Complete a campaign in co-op.
description.french: Achève une campagne en coopérative.
description.italian: Completa una campagna in cooperazione.
description.spanish: Completa una campaña en cooperativa.

description.english: Complete an Instant Action match in every game mode.
description.german: Ein Instant Action-Match im jedem Spielmodus abschließen.
description.french: Achève une partie d'Action instantanée dans chaque mode de jeu.
description.italian: Completa una partita di Azione Istantanea in ogni modalita' di gioco.
description.spanish: Completa una partida de Acción Instantánea en cada modo de juego.

description.english: Reach 20 kills against a god-like bot in instant action without dying.
description.german: Erzielen Sie in Instant Action 20 Kills gegen einen gottähnlichen Bot, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Atteins 20 coups mortels contre un robot omnipotent en action instantanée sans mourir.
description.italian: Raggiungi 20 uccisioni contro bot di livelli divino in azione senza morire.
description.spanish: Alcanza 20 golpes mortales contra un robot omnipotente en acción instantánea sin morir.

displayName.english: Like the Back of My Hand
displayName.spanish: Como la palma de mi mano

description.english: Collect every power up on every map.
description.german: Jedes Powerup auf der Karte sammeln.
description.french: Accumule tous les pouvoirs amplifiés de chaque carte.
description.italian: Colleziona ogni arma in ogni mappa.
description.spanish: Reúne todos los puntos de poder en cada mapa.

description.english: Play a match with every mutator, using only 1 per match.
description.german: Spielen Sie ein Match mit jedem Mutator, wobei Sie nur 1 pro Match verwenden.
description.french: Joue une partie avec chaque mutateur, en n'utilisant qu'un par partie.
description.italian: Gioca una partita con ogni mutante, usandone solo 1 per partita.
description.spanish: Juega una partida con cada mutador, usando 1 sólo por partida.

description.english: Get the "Head Hunter" award in 10 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Head Hunter"-Preis in 10 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Head Hunter » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Head Hunter" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Head Hunter" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Combo King" award in 10 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Combo King"-Preis in 10 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Combo King » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Combo King" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Combo King" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Biohazard" award in 10 matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Biohazard » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Biohazard" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Biohazard" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Gun Slinger" award in 10 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Gun Slinger"-Preis in 10 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Gun Slinger » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Gun Slinger" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Gun Slinger" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Blue Streak" award in 10 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Blue Streak"-Preis in 10 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Blue Streak » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Blue Streak" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Blue Streak" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "JackHammer" award in 10 matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « JackHammer » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "JackHammer"  in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "JackHammer" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Shaft Master" award in 10 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Shaft Master"-Preis in 10 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Shaft Master » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Shaft Master" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Shaft Master" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Rocket Scientist" award in 10 matches and "Flak Master" award in 10 matches.
description.french: Obtenir les récompenses "Expert en roquettes" et "Maître Flak" dans 10 parties
description.italian: Ottieni il titolo di scienziato di Missilistica in 10 partite, e maestro di contraerea in 10 partite
description.spanish: Obtén la recompensa Ingeniero de cohetes en 10 partidas y maestro antiaéreo en 10 partidas

description.english: Get the "Big Game Hunter" award in 10 matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Big Game Hunter » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Grande cacciatore" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Big Game Hunter" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Get the "Roadkill" award in 10 matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Roadkill » en 10 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Roadkill" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Roadkill" en 10 partidas.

description.english: Kill an enemy with every vehicle (except hoverboard).
description.german: Einen Feind mit jedem Fahrzeug (außer Hoverboard) töten.
description.french: Tue un ennemi avec chaque véhicule (aéroglisseur excepté).
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con ogni veicolo (eccetto hoverboard).
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con todos los vehículos (excepto el aerodeslizador).

description.english: Get the "Top Gun" award in 20 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie den "Top Gun"-Preis in 20 Matches.
description.french: Obtiens le prix « Top Gun » en 20 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio "Top Gun" in 10 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Top Gun" en 20 partidas.

description.english: Get "Bullseye" (self-destruct to destroy an enemy) award in 20 matches.
description.german: Erhalten Sie in 20 Matches den "Bullseye"-Preis (Selbstzerstörung, um Feind zu vernichten).
description.french: Obtiens un prix « Bullseye » (autodestruction pour détruire un ennemi) en 20 parties.
description.italian: Ottiemi il premio "Bullseye" (auto-distruzione per distruggere un nemico) in 20 partite.
description.spanish: Obtén el premio "Bullseye" (auto-destrucción para destruir al enemigo) en 20 partidas.

description.english: Have over 20 minutes of "Berserk Time".
description.french: Tiens plus de 20 minutes de « Berserk Time ».
description.italian: Ottentui 20 minuti di "Tempo di Berserk".
description.spanish: Ten más de 20 minutos de "Berserk Time".

description.english: Have over 20 minutes of "Invisibility Time".
description.french: Tiens plus de 20 minutes de « Invisibility Time ».
description.italian: Ottenuti 20 minuti di "Tempo di Invisibilita'".
description.spanish: Ten más de 20 minutos de "Invisibility Time".

description.english: Have over 10 minutes of "Invulnerable Time".
description.french: Tiens plus de 10 minutes de « Invulnerable Time ».
description.italian: Ottenuti 10 minuti di "Tempo di Invulnerabilita'".
description.spanish: Ten más de 10 minutos de "Tiempo invulnerable".

description.english: Have over 20 minutes of "UDamage Time".
description.french: Tiens plus de 20 minutes de « UDamage Time ».
description.italian: Ottenuti 20 minuti di "Tempo Udamage".
description.spanish: Ten más de 20 minutos de "UDamage Time".

description.english: Achieve a Hat Trick in 10 CTF or VCTF matches.
description.german: Hattrick in 10 CTF- oder VCTF-Matches erreichen.
description.french: Obtiens un coup du chapeau en 10 parties CTF ou VCTF.
description.italian: Raggiungi un Tripletta in 10 partite CTF o VCTF.
description.spanish: Logra un triplete en 10 partidas CTF o VCTF.

description.english: Return 100 Orbs in Warfare matches.
description.french: Rends 100 orbes dans des parties de Guerre.
description.italian: Restituisci 100 orbe in partire di guerra.
description.spanish: Devuelve 100 orbes en partidas de Guerra.

description.english: Completed 100 CTF matches played to at least 3 captures.
description.french: 100 parties CTF achevées jouées jusqu'au moins 3 captures.
description.italian: Completate 100 partite CTF giocate con almeno 3 catture.
description.spanish: Se realizaron 100 partidas CTF jugadas hasta por lo menos 3 capturas.

description.english: Complete 100 VCTF matches played to at least 3 captures.
description.french: Achève 100 parties VCTF jouées jusqu'au moins 3 captures.
description.italian: Completa 100 partite VCTF giocate con almeno tre catture.
description.spanish: Completa 100 partidas VCTF jugadas hasta por lo menos 3 capturas.

description.english: Complete 100 Deathmatch or Duel matches played to at least 20 kills.
description.german: 100 Deathmatch- oder Duell-Matches mit mindestens 20 Kills abschließen.
description.french: Achève 100 parties Deathmatch ou Duel jouées jusqu'au moins 20 coups mortels.
description.italian: Completa 100 partite mortali o partite duello giocate con almeno 20 uccisioni.
description.spanish: Completa 100 partidas Deathmatch o Duel con hasta por lo menos 20 golpes mortales.

description.english: Complete 100 Warfare matches played to at least 3 points.
description.french: Achève 100 parties de Guerre jouées jusqu'au moins 3 points.
description.italian: Completa almeno 100 partite di Warfare giocati con almeno 3 punti.
description.spanish: Completa 100 partidas de Guerra jugadas hasta por lo menos 3 puntos.

description.english: Get the "Killing Spree" award in 20 matches.
description.french: Obtenir la récompense "Folie Meurtrière" dans 20 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio Mattanza in 20 partite
description.spanish: Obtén la recompensa de Matanza en 20 partidas

description.english: Get the "Monster Kill" award in 20 matches.
description.french: Obtenir la récompense "Tuerie Monstrueuse" dans 20 parties.
description.italian: Ottieni il premio Mostruoso in 20 partite
description.spanish: Obtén la recompensa de Muerte Monstruosa en 20 partidas

description.english: End sprees in 20 matches.
description.french: Termine les raids en 20 parties.
description.italian: Finire le attivita' in 20 accoppiamenti.
description.spanish: Cesa los asaltos en 20 partidas.

description.english: Get the "First Blood" award in 40 matches.
description.french: Récompense "Premiers Sangs" obtenue dans 40 parties.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il premio Prima uccisione in 40 partite
description.spanish: Obtén Primera Sangre en 40 partidas

description.english: Complete a multiplayer match in every game type.
description.german: Ein Multiplayer-Match in jedem Spieltyp abschließen.
description.french: Achève une partie de multijoueurs dans chaque type de jeu.
description.italian: Completa una partita multigiocatore in ogni tipo di gioco.
description.spanish: Completa una partida con multijugadores en cada tipo de juego.

description.english: Win a multiplayer match on every map.
description.german: Ein Multiplayer-Match auf jeder Karte gewinnen.
description.french: Gagne une partie de multijoueurs sur chaque carte.
description.italian: Vinci una partita multi-giocatore in ogni mappa.
description.spanish: Gana una partida de multijugadores en cada mapa.

description.english: Get 200 kills in multiplayer on 50 different days.
description.german: 200 Kills in Multiplayer an 50 verschiedenen Tagen.
description.french: Obtiens 200 coups mortels sous multijoueurs en 50 jours différents.
description.italian: Ottieni 200 uccisioni in multi-giocatore in 50 giorni.
description.spanish: Obtén 200 golpes mortales con multijugadores en 50 días diferentes.

description.english: Win 500 online matches.
description.french: Gagne 500 parties en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci 500 partite online.
description.spanish: Gana 500 partidas en línea.

description.english: Grab 200 points worth of betrayal pots.
description.german: Schnappen Sie sich 200 Punkte aus dem Verrats-Konto
description.french: Saisis 200 points de cagnottes de trahison.
description.italian: Prendi 200 punti di fondo di tradimento.
description.spanish: Agarra 200 puntos de fondo de traición.

description.english: 20 successful retributions against a betrayer.
description.french: 20 revanches réussies contre un traître.
description.italian: 20 premi per successi contro un traditore.
description.spanish: 20 retribuciones exitosas en contra de un traidor.

description.english: Deliver 50 skulls in one score in Greed against adept or higher skilled bots.
description.german: Im Gier-Modus 50 Schädel in einem Spiel gegen erfahrene oder bessere Bots abliefern.
description.french: Remets 50 crânes en un score sous Avarice contre des robots experts ou plus doués.
description.italian: Rilasciare 50 teschi in un punteggio in Avidita' contro gli addetti o bots piu' capaci.
description.spanish: Entrega 50 cráneos en una calificación Codicia en contra de robots expertos o más capaces.

description.english: Score 500 skulls in Greed.
description.french: Marque 500 crânes sous Avarice.
description.italian: Ottieni 500 teschi in Greed.
description.spanish: Apunta 500 cráneos bajo Codicia.

description.english: Become a titan 20 times.
description.french: Deviens un titan 20 fois.
description.italian: Diventa un titano 20 volte.
description.spanish: Conviértete en titán 20 veces.

description.english: Become a Behemoth 10 times.
description.french: Deviens un Behemoth 10 fois.
description.italian: Diventa un Behemoth 10 volte.
description.spanish: Conviértete en Behemoth 10 veces.

description.english: 10 kills with every Titan weapon in one Titan transformation.
description.german: 10 Kills mit jeder Titan-Waffe in einer Titan-Transformation.
description.french: 10 coups mortels avec chaque arme Titan en une transformation Titan.
description.italian: 10 uccisioni con ogni arma Titanica in una trasformazione Titanica.
description.spanish: 10 golpes mortales con cada arma Titán en una transformación Titán.

description.english: Use the Slow Field power-up for over 10 minutes total.
description.german: Verwenden Sie das Langsamfeld-Powerup insgesamt über 10 Minuten.
description.french: Utilise le pouvoir amplifié de Zone au ralenti pour plus de 10 minutes au total.
description.italian: Innesca il Campo Lento per un totale di oltre 10 minuti.
description.spanish: Utiliza el punto de poder Campo Lento por más de 10 minutos en total.

description.english: Get 100 kills with the Eradicator.
description.french: Obtiens 100 coups mortels avec l'Éradicateur.
description.italian: Ottieni 100 uccisioni con Sradicatiore.
description.spanish: Obtén 100 golpes mortales con el Erradicador.

description.english: Kill 10 people with spidermines in deathmatch.
description.german: 10 Personen in Deathmatch mit Spinnenminen töten.
description.french: Tue 10 personnes avec les araignées mines dans une partie à mort.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 persone con mine spider in accoppiamento mortale.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 personas con minas araña en una partida a muerte.
